arts.ttl: Germany see off debutant Poland to start Women’s Euro with victory
arts.sum: Just like last year’s Olympics, Jule Brand and Lea Schüller scored in Germany’s first game of the Euros

arts.ttl: Germany v Poland: Women’s Euro 2025 – live
arts.sum: Updates from this Group C match (8pm BST kick-off) Interactive player guide | Wallchart | And mail Scott … but before kick-off, there’s a minute of silence to be perfectly observed. Both teams huddle. Then the warmest round of applause. Oh Diogo. Oh André. Our hearts break for you. xx The teams are out. Germany in white shirts and black shorts, Poland decked out from head to toe in red. We’ll be off once coins have been tossed, fists bumped, and pennants exchanged. Continue reading...
